name: Sto Ltd
description:
High performance external wall insulation, render and acoustic systems. 

Sto Ltd. is an innovative, award-winning and market leading manufacturer and distributor of:
 
• Crack and impact resistant external wall insulation systems 
• Passivhaus certified facade systems 
• Thin-coat acrylic renders
• Rainscreen Cladding systems (Glass, Stone, Render)
• Facade and interior paints 
• Acoustic systems 

Our vision is to be technology leaders in the sustainable design of living spaces tailored to human needs, worldwide. Sto Ltd. is a wholly owned subsidiary of Sto AG and operates within the UK and Ireland.
 ______________________________________________________________________________
 
Our core business focus is on developing systems which actively contribute to the long term environmental benefit of society.
 
Sustainable Credentials: 
• EN ISO 14001:2004 (2009) accredited 
• Our products contain up to 96% recycled materials 
• Removal of an estimated 150 million tons of CO2 since 1960 through EWI installations
